price: (Orang-orang kafir) berkata, "Apakah sesungguhnya kami benar-benar dikembalikan kepada kehidupan semula1552?
footnotes: 1552.  Setelah orang-orang kafir mendengar adanya hari kebangkitan sesudah mati, mereka merasa heran dan mengejek sebab menurut keyakinan mereka tidak ada hari kebangkitan itu.  Itulah sebabnya mereka bertanya demikian itu.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
